div.div:
What is the gwt-generator project ?
The gwt-generator project in an online UML diagram editor with generation features. This application is still in active development but you can already test it. Please note that this application only runs on modern browers.
Features :
Create Uml diagrams : Class, Object and Sequence.
Save and restore your diagrams when you are logged.
Generate the code for your hibernate POJOS, annoted with JPA.
See this page for the full list of supported class relations and the java generated code.
What's planned ?
We've planned to generate the code for the seam framework from the diagrams. Generating XML schemas from class diagrams is also on our roadmap.
Where can I report an issue or suggest a feature ?
Gwt-generator is an open source project hosted on google code.
Please use the bug tracker to report an issue or add a suggestion!
Any contribution would be highly appreciated !
About
Gwt-generator is based on the gwt-uml project and runs on Google App Engine.
This project is an ObjetDirect project from ODLabs departement. ObjetDirect is a french company supporting open source projects.
